column4: Hey there to all: I have an original problem. When I type ifconfig -a, there is no eth* listed ! Is that to say that the driver to eth0 was not found when I installed Jaunty on this Lenovo Y550P??
it sounds like it. have a look in lspci -vv. it will say what driver is controlling the ethernet adapter
cheers! RE this absence of eth0, I found this. Ethernet controller: Broadcom Corporation Device 1692 (rev 01). Errr. Is there a specific site where I should locate the driver, or… ?
ouch, was that smiley addressed to me (suggesting : “good luck, mate, youre in for a tough one“)??
